column3: SSR21296 Upload file button should be appeared on right side.
column6: Click on the Upload files from left menu.

column4: Navigate to the page containing the upload file button.
Verify that the upload file button is displayed on the right side of the page.

column3: SSR21297 Facility selection modal should be appeared.
column6: Click on Upload file button from right side.

column2: 1. Ensure that the user is logged in to the application.
2. Navigate to the page where the facility selection modal is available.

column4: Ensure that the user is logged in to the application.
Navigate to the page where the facility selection modal is available.
Click on the button that triggers the facility selection modal.
Verify that the modal appears on the screen.
Inspect the modal to ensure that it includes the expected features, such as a search bar, facility list, and selection button.

column3: SSR21298 Linked organization list is displayed.
column6: Verify that facility selection modal shall only display the list of linked organization.

column4: Login to the application as a user with permissions to view linked organizations.
Verify that the list of linked organizations is displayed.
